languages.text: "Джай... ведет себя немного демонстративно в вопросах ее связи с Лорд-капитаном. Необычное поведение для принцессы. Похоже, у знати на Ифрите совсем другие порядки".
"Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."
languages.original_text: "Джай... ведет себя немного демонстративно в вопросах ее связи с Лорд-капитаном. Необычное поведение для принцессы. Похоже, у знати на Ифрите совсем другие порядки".

traits.locale_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

languages.text: “婕伊……她毫不掩饰自己与舰长大人之间的亲密关系。以公主的身份而言，这相当不同寻常。艾弗里特贵族的礼仪标准真是与众不同。”
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊……她毫不掩饰自己与舰长大人之间的亲密关系。以公主的身份而言，这相当不同寻常。艾弗里特贵族的礼仪标准真是与众不同。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Jae... ne semble pas vouloir cacher la relation qu'elle entretient avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. C'est même plutôt le contraire. C'est inhabituel, pour une princesse. Les nobles d'Éfrit n'ont peut-être pas la même notion des convenances que nous. »
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: « Jae... ne semble pas vouloir cacher la relation qu'elle entretient avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. C'est même plutôt le contraire. C'est inhabituel, pour une princesse. Les nobles d'Éfrit n'ont peut-être pas la même notion des convenances que nous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Jae... es bastante abierta respecto a su relación con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es un comportamiento impropio de una princesa. Parece que los nobles de Efreet no comparten nuestro concepto del decoro».
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: «Jae... es bastante abierta respecto a su relación con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es un comportamiento impropio de una princesa. Parece que los nobles de Efreet no comparten nuestro concepto del decoro».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ジェイ…はロード・キャプテンとの繋がりをずいぶんとオープンにしています。王女にしては珍しい振る舞いです。イフリートの貴族たちは、礼儀に対する考え方がまったく違うようですね」
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイ…はロード・キャプテンとの繋がりをずいぶんとオープンにしています。王女にしては珍しい振る舞いです。イフリートの貴族たちは、礼儀に対する考え方がまったく違うようですね」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Jae ... ist recht offen über ihre Beziehung zum Lord Captain. Ungewöhnliches Verhalten für eine Prinzessin. Offenbar haben die Adligen auf Efreet ganz andere Vorstellungen davon, was schicklich ist."
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: "Jae ... ist recht offen über ihre Beziehung zum Lord Captain. Ungewöhnliches Verhalten für eine Prinzessin. Offenbar haben die Adligen auf Efreet ganz andere Vorstellungen davon, was schicklich ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

languages.text: "Jae... Lord Kaptan'la ilişkisini biraz açık etmiyor mu? Bir prensesten beklenmeyecek davranışlar. İfrit soylularının edep anlayışı başka oluyormuş demek."
languages.original_text: "Jae... is being quite open about her connection to the Lord Captain. Unusual behaviour for a princess. It seems the nobles on Efreet have very different ideas of propriety."

traits.locale_text: "Jae... Lord Kaptan'la ilişkisini biraz açık etmiyor mu? Bir prensesten beklenmeyecek davranışlar. İfrit soylularının edep anlayışı başka oluyormuş demek."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
